|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L;SiGe, 5003L, 336AX;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2576L;;3; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "MR900 V2-0.10 LFP" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"7016A0647004", "V1.00", and a date code of '''1328''' is silkscreened on the Mini PCIe wireless module.
The Flash chip used looks to be in the MX25L128... series (16 MB)..
==Probable used PSU(s)== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Powertron''' PA1024-2HUB / PA1024-2HU / PA1024-120HUB200.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Powertron |model=PA1024-120HUB200 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |manuf_country=China |e_level=5 |style=medium, horiz. }}
